info.name: Project-1-goRestServer-REST-API's Final Copy
info.description:
- Type of API's : REST APIs
    
- API Documentation format : cURL
    
- Classification of APIs : Public APIs + Secured APIs
    
- Algorithm used for API Security : Bearer Access Token
    
- To Get your Access Token, login to the [https://gorest.co.in/](https://gorest.co.in/) with github/google/microsoft account
    
- #of APIs developed : 4
    
- HTTP METHODS used : GET,POST,PATCH,DELETE
    
- API Documentation page/url : [https://gorest.co.in/](https://gorest.co.in/)

item.name: E2E API AUTOMATION
Create User into  gorest Server

exec: pm.test("Verify if response code with response message received from Server is 201 Created", function () {
pm.test("Verify if Response time received from server < 2 seconds", function () {
pm.test("Verify if response body is received from server", function () {
pm.test("Verify if response Content-Type is received from server in JSON format", function () {
pm.test("Verify if response body is received from server has fields such as id,name,gender,status,email", function () {
pm.test("Verify if response gender is received from server either male or female", function () {
pm.test("Verify if response status is received from server either active or inactive", function () {
console.log("The name of the request is "+pm.info.requestName)
console.log("The response body is received from server :")
pm.execution.setNextRequest("Verify If User is created Into gorest Server"); //execute the next API

request.description:
_This is a_ _**REST API**_ _that uses http method as POST and it creates new request into existing specified database/server._

_Exp Result:_

_(i)Verify if the response code received from server is 201 Created_

_(ii)Verify if server response time < 5 seconds_

_(iii)Verify if response body is received from server_

_(iv)Verify if response body is received in JSON format_

_(v)Verify if response body has fields such as id,name,gender,emails,status_

item.name: Verify If User is created Into gorest Server

console.log("The response body is received from server :")
console.log("The response headers is received from server are "+pm.response.headers)
//JSON VALUE CHECK-->EXTRACTING THE DATA FROM RESPONSE BODY

request.description:
_This is a_ _**REST API**_ _that uses http method as_ _**GET**_ _and it retrieves/read/fetches the existing user details from the database/server._

_Exp Result:_

_(i)Verify if the response code received from server is 200 OK_

_(ii)Verify if server response time < 5 seconds_

_(iii)Verify if response body is received from server_

_(iv)Verify if response body is received in JSON format_

_(v)Verify if response body has fields such as id,name,gender,emails,status_

_This is a_ _**REST API**_ _that uses http method as POST and it creates new request into existing specified database/server._

_Exp Result:_

_(i)Verify if the response code received from server is 201 Created_

_(ii)Verify if server response time < 5 seconds_

_(iii)Verify if response body is received from server_

_(iv)Verify if response body is received in JSON format_

_(v)Verify if response body has fields such as id,name,gender,emails,status_
